title: Can anyone sugest me an unique topic for an article? - Quora

response.answer_text: I will suggest one interesting topic to you. If the inanimate objects or things we use on day to day, speaks, what will they tell to us?.You can imagine and write very interesting articles. I think you understand that, you can write jovially and it will be very funny also. I will tell you one example for that. If the smart phone Alarm speaks, what it will tell to you?. Cellphone Alarm Speaks, hello wake-up man, it is already 6 a.m in the morning. Don't Snooze me, Daily your doing like this only. How you ever get up in a single alarm? Tell man. You are sleeping and I am getting a bad name, coz of you. Get up man. Go and do some exercise and make yourself ready to go to office in time man. Really I am feedup with you. Hurry up. I think you can like this topic. Tell in your comments and share your articles here in Quota. Ok.
